entry.title: Active
entry.content:
I am happy to finally share our (@JulienPhilip2 and George Drettakis) ACM TOG paper, to be presented at SIGGRAPH 2022. We propose Active Exploration, an extension of Active Learning using MCMC, for Neural Global Illumination of Variable Scenes. Website: https://t.co/FBZC0FWP8m pic.twitter.com/nMciN3AHVz

— Stavros Diolatzis (@StavrosDiol) March 4, 2022
